body.name: Steamer for Clothes, 1600W 15S Fast Heat-up Handheld Clothes Steamer with Ironing Gloves, Detachable 12.85oz Water Tank Portable Fabric Wrinkle Iron Remover for Home Travel Hotel
features: 𝐏𝐎𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐔𝐋 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑 𝐅𝐎𝐑 𝐂𝐋𝐎𝐓𝐇𝐄𝐒 - 1350W powerful clothes steamer has powerful steam function, it only takes 15 seconds to preheat. Smart garment steamer can enter the fabric area that is difficult to touch during washing, remove the most stubborn wrinkles.

𝟑𝟔𝟎° 𝐀𝐍𝐓𝐈-𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐊 𝐂𝐋𝐎𝐓𝐇𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑 - Steamer for clothes with 360° anti-leak technology, allowing you to iron clothes at any angle without worrying about dripping or stains. High-quality handheld garment steamer brings you a comfortable ironing experience.

𝐋𝐀𝐑𝐆𝐄 𝐃𝐄𝐓𝐀𝐂𝐇𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 𝐖𝐀𝐓𝐄𝐑 𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐊 - 12.85oz large detachable water tank can steam continuously for 15 minutes, reducing the trouble of frequent water addition, which can iron 15 pieces of clothing at a time.
𝐏𝐎𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐔𝐋 𝐒𝐓𝐑𝐎𝐍𝐆 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑 - Handheld clothes steamer has 3 steam modes (low/medium/high) are available. Different steam modes can be selected according to the fabric and thickness of the clothes.

𝐌𝐔𝐋𝐓𝐈𝐏𝐔𝐑𝐏𝐎𝐒𝐄 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑 - Handheld clothes steamer can not only be used for ironing clothes made of silk, wool, polyester, velvet, fiber and other fabrics, but can also be used for furniture and toys such as curtains, sofas, carpets and beds.

𝐈𝐑𝐎𝐍𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐆𝐋𝐎𝐕𝐄𝐒 - Clothes steamer included heat-resistant ironing glove, can be used as a mini-ironing board to help you iron clothes more smoothly. And storage bag for easy storage, allowing you to put the steamer in a backpack or suitcase, ensuring that you can keep it refined even when traveling or on business.

𝐓𝐑𝐀𝐕𝐄𝐋 𝐂𝐋𝐎𝐓𝐇𝐄𝐒 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌𝐄𝐑 - Portable travel steamer for clothes is not only versatile and efficient but also highly convenient for travel purposes. Its portable design makes it easy to pack and carry, making it the perfect companion for business trips, vacations, or any other occasions where you need to look your best.
body.description: 👉Introducing our Steamer for Clothes - the ultimate ironing companion! ✔With a powerful 1600W heating element, clothes steamer delivers efficient and powerful steaming performance, ensuring that even the most stubborn wrinkles and creases are eliminated in no time. ✔The quick heat-up time of just 15 seconds means that you can start steaming clothes in a flash, saving you valuable time and effort. ✔Say goodbye to the hassle of ironing and embrace the convenience and efficiency of the steamer iron for clothes. ✨ 3 Steam Levels The low steam level (green light) is perfect for delicate fabrics, while the middle steam level (blue light) is ideal for everyday clothing. And for those stubborn wrinkles, the high steam level (red light) will do the trick! ✨ Use at Any Angle Featuring a 360° portability design, this clothes steamer allows for hassle-free steaming experience, no matter the angle you use clothing steamer. ✨9.8 FT/3M Long Cord Garment steamer is equipped with an upgraded extra-long 9.8FT/3M cord, solve the problem that the plug cannot reach the power socket, and steamer clothes easily at home. ✨Useful Accessories𝑰𝒓𝒐𝒏𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝑮𝒍𝒐𝒗𝒆𝒔 - Our Ironing Glove is designed with a finger loop and heat resistant ironing board to provide ultimate protection for your hands from hot steam. 𝑭𝒂𝒃𝒓𝒊𝒄 𝑩𝒓𝒖𝒔𝒉 - It helps you easily remove dust and lint from your clothing, while the line clip sharpens the edges of collars and ties. 𝑴𝒆𝒂𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝑪𝒖𝒑 & 𝑺𝒕𝒐𝒓𝒂𝒈𝒆 𝑩𝒂𝒈 - The measuring cup provided with our clothes steamer makes filling the tank a breeze. Plus, we've also included a dust-proof storage bag for easy travel and storage. 💝What You Get: 1x Steamer for Clothes 1x Steamer Ironing Glove 1x Measuring Cup 1x Fabric Brush 1x Storage Bag 1x User Manual

productInformation.value: Portable travel handheld steamer has 3 steam modes to choose from, preheated in 15sec, with 380ml water tank, can steam continuously for 30mins

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: The steamer heats up within seconds of being plugged in. The steam is powerful and works very well in straightening out wrinkles. The steamer works better than I expected. I can retire my iron for now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast heating steamer
reviews.reviewText: The handled clothes steamer heats up quickly, efficiently removing wrinkles on my shirts. And it comes with an ironing glove for safety and nice fabric bag to store the accessories.

reviews.reviewerName: buy the right thingbuy the right thing
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An upgrade from my old boring streamer
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steamer as a replacement for my recently malfunctioning one. Despite its affordable price, it has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. I also appreciate its lightweight and sleek design.The streamer comes with different attachments that I haven’t got a chance to try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It heats very quickly and has three temperatures, suitable for fabrics of different materials. Ironing clothes is quick and easy. Don’t forget to remove the transparent packaging from the air outlet of the machine before ironing. I forgot, it smells like plastic when heated. 😓
